Packages that use CommunicationAdapter
es.csic.iiia.bms Implementation of the binarized max-sum algorithm as interactions between factors. 
es.csic.iiia.bms.factors Efficient implementations of some particular higher-order factors.

Classes in es.csic.iiia.bms that implement CommunicationAdapter
 class DirectCommunicationAdapter
          Communication adapter that delivers messages as soon as they are emitted.
 class TickCommunicationAdapter
          Communication adapter that delivers messages by rounds.
